amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5082 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Upon reconsideration, cloture on amendment SA 5082 invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 77 - 21. Record Vote Number: 149.
Motion by Senator McConnell to reconsider the vote by which cloture on amendment SA 5082 was not invoked (Record Vote No. 146) agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Motion to proceed to consideration of the motion to reconsider the vote by which cloture on amendment SA 5082 was not invoked (Record Vote No. 146) agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Motion by Senator McConnell to reconsider the vote by which cloture on amendment SA 5082 was not invoked (Record Vote No. 146) entered in Senate.
Cloture on amendment SA 5082 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 55. Record Vote Number: 146.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 5082 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 5082 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cochran. (consideration: CR S5968: text: CR S5968) In the nature of a substitute.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5082 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Upon reconsideration, cloture on amendment SA 5082 invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 77 - 21. Record Vote Number: 149.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 5082 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 55. Record Vote Number: 146.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5082 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cochran.
